attributes.action: Stop closing down the nuclear powerplants, they are actually safe and Green.
attributes.additional_details: I'm a Fourteen Year Old boy who is currently unhopeful for the future, this government has for far to long ignored climate change, and is clearly uninformed when it comes to such matters. If you close down the Nuclear Powerplants it only becomes harder for us to get off Dirty Energy (Like Oil and Coal).
attributes.background: The Government is closing down Nuclear Powerplants citing that they are 'unsafe', the fact is that Nuclear Energy is very safe, furthermore is better for the environment in general, as it doesn't pump CO2 and Greenhouse gases into the atmosphere.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

Most existing nuclear plants are set to close by 2028 (because they'll have reached the end of their life), but the Government is supporting new power plants:

https://www.gov.uk/government/news/nuclear-energy-what-you-need-to-know
